name: webpack-node-module-types
description: Attempts to classify each dependency under node_modules as a CJS or ESM package
author: Xunnamius

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.types.json && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config-name main && mkdir async sync && cp -f dist/index.d.ts async/index.d.ts && cp -f dist/sync.d.ts sync/index.d.ts && echo "module.exports = require('../dist/sync');" > sync/index.js && echo "module.exports = require('../dist/index');" > async/index.js
scripts.check-types: rm -f npm.pipe; touch npm.pipe; command -v unbuffer >/dev/null; X=$?; [ $X -eq 0 ] && unbuffer tsc --project tsconfig.check-types.json >> npm.pipe; Y=$?; [ $Y -eq 0 ] && echo >> npm.pipe; unbuffer eslint --parser-options=project:tsconfig.check-types.json src >> npm.pipe; Z=$?; [ $X -ne 0 ] && tsc --project tsconfig.check-types.json >> npm.pipe && eslint --parser-options=project:tsconfig.check-types.json src >> npm.pipe; W=$?; cat npm.pipe | less -R -FX; rm npm.pipe; [ $W -eq 0 ] && [ $X -eq 1 ] || [ $X -eq 0 ] && [ $Y -eq 0 ] && [ $Z -eq 0 ]
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist npm.pipe coverage external-scripts/bin async sync
scripts.fixup: npm run check-types && npm run test && npx npm-force-resolutions && npx Xunnamius/sort-package-json && npm audit
